data.eml:eml: Hidden conservation vulnerability within a cryptic species complex: taxonomic revision of the spotted skink (Oligosoma lineoocellatum, Reptilia: Scincidae) from New Zealand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Melzer, Sabine, Bell, Trent, Patterson, Geoff B. (2017): Hidden conservation vulnerability within a cryptic species complex: taxonomic revision of the spotted skink (Oligosoma lineoocellatum, Reptilia: Scincidae) from New Zealand. Zootaxa 4300 (3): 355-379, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4300.3.2
